name: runloop-mcp-server
description: MCP server for Runloop devbox management - create, manage, and interact with cloud development environments

tools.name: list_devboxes
tools.description: List all devboxes with optional filtering by status

tools.name: get_devbox
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific devbox by ID

tools.name: create_devbox
tools.description: Create a new devbox with specified configuration

tools.name: execute_command
tools.description: Execute a command on a devbox and get the result

tools.name: resume_devbox
tools.description: Resume a suspended devbox by ID

tools.name: create_snapshot
tools.description: Create a snapshot of a devbox
